title: Ask Mister Lizard
description: Mister Lizard and his lab helper Timmy learn about family-friendly science topics like nitroglycerin, jet engines, and geothermal energy.
altHero: Mister Lizard and Timmy in the lab
alt1: Timmy stands by as Mister Lizard sparks a lighter
alt2: Mister Lizard calls out to the producers while Timmy is headless from an explosion
alt3: Mister Lizard and Timmy stand near a jet engine that says “Danger”
alt4: Mister Lizard peeks out from behind a blast shield
